articles.title: Tai chi may slow Parkinson's symptoms for years, study finds - BBC.com
articles.description: The traditional gentle Chinese exercise showed balance and movement benefits for patients.
articles.content:
Tai chi may help slow down the symptoms of Parkinson's disease for several years, a Chinese study suggests. 
Those who practised the martial art twice a week had fewer complications and better quali… [+3403 chars]

articles.title: This $1000 Test Finds Signs of Cancer in Your Blood - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The Galleri test is designed to detect more than 50 cancers. Doctors are split on whether it is worth the risks for patients.
